common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Use this api to unbind first mile.

error_list.name: firstmile.business_error
error_list.description: There is common business error

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: One FM code cannot be predeclared with different shipping methods

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The SLS TN does not belong to FM enabled TWS.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The SLS TN is tied to another FM code

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The FM code does not exist

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: System error (TWS fail), please contact Shopee

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The logistics status is not supported for binding

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The SLS TN does not exist

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The SLS TN is not a CB TN

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The FM status is incorrect.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: System error, please try again later/ contact Shopee

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: You used a Delivered FM code, please use a new FM code.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: Your predeclared order creation time is later than pick up time, please use a new FM code.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The shipping method and logistics id are not matched

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: System error, please contact Shopee

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: FM Code WHSID can only bind SLS TN with the same WHSID

error_list.name: error_not_found
error_list.description: Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: firstmile.auth
error_list.description: The shop has no permission for first mile support.

error_list.name: firstmile.batch_api_all_failed
error_list.description: Failed, please check result_list for more details.

error_list.name: firstmile.system_error
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: firstmile.param_duplication
error_list.description: Duplicate order_sn {order_sn} or package_number: {package_number}.

error_list.name: firstmile.invalid_order_status
error_list.description: The status of order(order_sn: {order_sn}) is invalid. Please check the order status.

error_list.name: firstmile.invalid_package
error_list.description: Package is not exist.

error_list.name: firstmile.order_has_been_split
error_list.description: The order(order_sn: {order_sn}) has been split

error_list.name: firstmile.order_not_exist
error_list.description: Order is not exist.

error_list.name: firstmile.package_has_not_bind
error_list.description: The SLS TN has not been tied to any first mile code.

error_list.name: firstmile.shipment_pre_declare_permission
error_list.description: The shop has no permission for first mile pre declare.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.description: Invalid access_token.
